remarks: Equivalence of ordered pair abstraction subclass and implication.  Compare ~ ssopab2b .  (Contributed by FL, 6-Nov-2013.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement: ssoprab2b $p |- ( { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } C_ { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ps } <-> A. x A. y A. z ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
